casebody.data:
No. 09-1254. Marei Von Saher, Petitioner v. Norton Simon Museum of Art at Pasadena, et al. 562 U.S. 821, 131 S. Ct. 379,

178 L. Ed. 2d 15,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 6643. October 4, 2010.

The Acting Solicitor General is invited to file a brief in this case expressing the views of the United States.

Same case below, 592 F.3d 954.
